name: SSF1
title: CS Site-Specific Factor 1
subtitle: Separate Tumor Nodules - Ipsilateral Lung
notes:
**Note 1**:  Separate tumor nodules in the ipsilateral lung are coded separately from CS Extension.  Separate tumor nodules in the contralateral lung are coded in CS Mets at DX.

**Note 2**:  Separate tumor nodules can be defined clinically (by imaging) and/or pathologically.

**Note 3**:  If separate tumor nodules are not mentioned in imaging and/or pathological reports, use code 000.

**Note 4**: For in situ tumors, code CS Site-Factor 1 to 000.
rows: Separate tumor nodules in ipsilateral lung, same lobe
Separate tumor nodules in ipsilateral lung, different lobe

020 + 010

Separate tumor nodules, ipsilateral lung, same and different lobe
Separate tumor nodules, ipsilateral lung, unknown if same or different lobe

OBSOLETE DATA CONVERTED V0200 
See code 988  

Not applicable for this site

Not applicable:  Information not collected for this case
(May include cases converted from code 888 used in CSv1 for "Not applicable" or when the item was not collected.  If this item is required to derive T, N, M, or any stage, use of code 988 may result in an error.)
